attributes.action: Stop the Welsh assembly delaying the Covid19 vaccine
attributes.additional_details: I have no confidence in the Welsh assembly to distribute the vaccine efficiently.
attributes.background: Stop the Welsh government holding back vaccination so that they don’t ‘run out before they receive the next batch’

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government or Welsh Parliament is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Welsh Parliament has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Parliament, you can find out more here:
https://petitions.senedd.wales/
